title: Filer
noPDFSupport: Nettleseren din støtter ikke PDF-filer. Vennligst last ned PDF-filen for å vise den:
cantBePreviewed: Beklager, denne filen kan ikke forhåndsvises

shareModal.title: Share Files
shareModal.description: Copy the link below and share it with your friends.

renameModal.descriptionFile: Velg et nytt navn for denne filen.
renameModal.descriptionFolder: Velg et nytt navn for denne mappen.

deleteModal.descriptionItem: {count, plural, one {Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.} other {Are you sure you want to delete {count} items? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.}}
deleteModal.descriptionFolder: {count, plural, one {Are you sure you want to delete this folder? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.} other {Are you sure you want to delete {count} folders? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.}}
deleteModal.descriptionFile: {count, plural, one {Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.} other {Are you sure you want to delete {count} files? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.}}

newFolderModal.title: Ny mappe
newFolderModal.description: Insert the name of the folder you want to create.
